modules.description: This module implements the L-BFGS optimization algorithm for minimizing or maximizing a differentiable objective function over a collection of parameters. It operates on parameter values and function values represented as `Owl.Algodiff.D.t`, and uses a parameter module `P` to handle the structure of the parameters. It is suitable for numerical optimization tasks in machine learning or scientific computing where the objective function and its gradient are available.

This module provides an implementation of the L-BFGS optimization algorithm for minimizing or maximizing differentiable objective functions over structured parameters. It works with parameter and function values represented as `Owl.Algodiff.D.t`, leveraging a parameter module `P` to manage parameter structure. Users can perform numerical optimization in machine learning or scientific computing tasks where both the objective function and its gradient are available. For example, it can optimize model parameters in a differentiable machine learning model using gradient information.
